attributes.action: Block moves to replace the Royal Crest on Birth, marriage and death certificates certificates with the EU Flag
attributes.additional_details:
It has been reported that within the next several years as early as 2015 that the Royal Crest on all future birth, marriage and death certificates will be replaced by the EU Flag. This move should be blocked immediately by parliamentary measures. This is yet another EU measure that will further erode British national identity.

No concession should be made to the EU on this issue and should be blocked immediately and an indepth review carried out as to how the country has arrived in a position where the EU can dictate these changes.
